MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void ClearHmenuProps (ref Accessibility._RemotableHandle hmenu, uint idChild, ref Guid paProps, int cProps);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearHmenuProps([in]valuetype Accessibility._RemotableHandle& hmenu, [in]unsigned int32 idChild, [in]valuetype System.Guid& paProps, [in]int32 cProps) runtime managed
Public Overridable Sub ClearHmenuProps (ByRef hmenu As _RemotableHandle, idChild As UInteger, ByRef paProps As Guid, cProps As Integer)
public: virtual void ClearHmenuProps(Accessibility::_RemotableHandle % hmenu, System::UInt32 idChild, Guid % paProps, int cProps) = Accessibility::IAccPropServices::ClearHmenuProps;

param.name: hmenu
param.span: 識別要標註的 HMENU 可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the HMENU-based accessible element to be annotated.

param.name: idChild
param.span: 指定可存取項目的子項目識別碼。

span.span: Specifies the child ID of the accessible element.

param.name: paProps
param.span: 指定要重設之屬性的陣列。

span.span: Specifies an array of properties to be reset.

param.span: 這些屬性會還原為在經過標註之前所顯示的預設行為。

span.span: These properties will revert to the default behavior that they displayed before they were annotated.

param.name: cProps
param.span: 指定 paProps 陣列中的屬性數目。

span.span: Specifies the number of properties in the paProps array.

param.span: 緩衝區的指標，接收識別字串。

span.span: Pointer to a buffer that receives the identity string.

param.span: 被呼叫端會使用 配置緩衝區。

span.span: The callee allocates this buffer using .

param.span: 結束時，呼叫端必須呼叫 以釋放緩衝區。

span.span: When finished, the caller must free the buffer by calling .

param.name: pdwIDStringLen

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetHmenuPropServer (ref Accessibility._RemotableHandle hmenu, uint idChild, ref Guid paProps, int cProps, Accessibility.IAccPropServer pServer, Accessibility.AnnoScope AnnoScope);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetHmenuPropServer([in]valuetype Accessibility._RemotableHandle& hmenu, [in]unsigned int32 idChild, [in]valuetype System.Guid& paProps, [in]int32 cProps, [in]class Accessibility.IAccPropServer pServer, [in]valuetype Accessibility.AnnoScope AnnoScope) runtime managed

public: virtual void SetHmenuPropServer(Accessibility::_RemotableHandle % hmenu, System::UInt32 idChild, Guid % paProps, int cProps, Accessibility::IAccPropServer ^ pServer, Accessibility::AnnoScope AnnoScope) = Accessibility::IAccPropServices::SetHmenuPropServer;

param.name: hmenu
param.span: 識別要標註的 HMENU 可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the HMENU-accessible element to be annotated.

param.name: idChild
param.span: 識別要標註的可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the accessible element that is to be annotated.

param.span: 這會取代識別字串。

span.span: This replaces the identity string.

param.name: paProps
param.span: 指定屬性陣列，該陣列會由指定的回呼物件所處理。

span.span: Specifies an array of properties that is to be handled by the specified callback object.

param.name: cProps
param.span: 指定 paProps 陣列中的屬性數目。

span.span: Specifies the number of properties in the paProps array.

param.name: pServer
param.span: 指定回呼物件，用戶端要求其中一個被覆寫的屬性時，便會叫用該物件。

span.span: Specifies the callback object, which will be invoked when a client requests one of the overridden properties.

param.name: AnnoScope
param.span: 可以是 ANNO_THIS，表示附註只會影響指定的可存取項目，或者為 ANNO_CONTAINER，表示附註會套用到項目與其直接子項目。

span.span: May be ANNO_THIS, indicating that the annotation affects the indicated accessible element only; or ANNO_CONTAINER, indicating that it applies to the element and its immediate element children.

summary.span: 和其所有公開的成員都是元件物件模型 (COM) 介面之 Managed 包裝函式的一部分。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetHwndPropServer (ref Accessibility._RemotableHandle hwnd, uint idObject, uint idChild, ref Guid paProps, int cProps, Accessibility.IAccPropServer pServer, Accessibility.AnnoScope AnnoScope);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetHwndPropServer([in]valuetype Accessibility._RemotableHandle& hwnd, [in]unsigned int32 idObject, [in]unsigned int32 idChild, [in]valuetype System.Guid& paProps, [in]int32 cProps, [in]class Accessibility.IAccPropServer pServer, [in]valuetype Accessibility.AnnoScope AnnoScope) runtime managed

public: virtual void SetHwndPropServer(Accessibility::_RemotableHandle % hwnd, System::UInt32 idObject, System::UInt32 idChild, Guid % paProps, int cProps, Accessibility::IAccPropServer ^ pServer, Accessibility::AnnoScope AnnoScope) = Accessibility::IAccPropServices::SetHwndPropServer;

param.name: hwnd
param.span: 識別要標註的可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the accessible element that is to be annotated.

param.span: 這會取代識別字串。

span.span: This replaces the identity string.

param.name: idObject
param.span: 識別要標註的可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the accessible element that is to be annotated.

param.span: 這會取代識別字串。

span.span: This replaces the identity string.

param.name: idChild
param.span: 識別要標註的可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the accessible element that is to be annotated.

param.span: 這會取代識別字串。

span.span: This replaces the identity string.

param.name: paProps
param.span: 指定屬性陣列，該陣列會由指定的回呼物件所處理。

span.span: Specifies an array of properties that is to be handled by the specified callback object.

param.name: cProps
param.span: 指定 paProps 陣列中的屬性數目。

span.span: Specifies the number of properties in the paProps array.

param.name: pServer
param.span: 指定回呼物件，用戶端要求其中一個被覆寫的屬性時，便會叫用該物件。

span.span: Specifies the callback object, which will be invoked when a client requests one of the overridden properties.

param.name: AnnoScope
param.span: 可以是 ANNO_THIS，表示附註只會影響指定的可存取項目，或者為 ANNO_CONTAINER，表示附註會套用到項目與其直接子項目。

span.span: May be ANNO_THIS, indicating that the annotation affects the indicated accessible element only; or ANNO_CONTAINER, indicating that it applies to the element and its immediate element children.

summary.span: 和其所有公開的成員都是元件物件模型 (COM) 介面之 Managed 包裝函式的一部分。

span.span: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) interface.

Public Overridable Sub SetHwndPropStr (ByRef hwnd As _RemotableHandle, idObject As UInteger, idChild As UInteger, idProp As Guid, str As String)

public: virtual void SetHwndPropStr(Accessibility::_RemotableHandle % hwnd, System::UInt32 idObject, System::UInt32 idChild, Guid idProp, System::String ^ str) = Accessibility::IAccPropServices::SetHwndPropStr;

param.name: hwnd
param.span: 識別要標註的可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the accessible element that is to be annotated.

param.span: 這會取代識別字串。

span.span: This replaces the identity string.

param.name: idObject
param.span: 識別要標註的可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the accessible element that is to be annotated.

param.span: 這會取代識別字串。

span.span: This replaces the identity string.

param.name: idChild
param.span: 識別要標註的可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the accessible element that is to be annotated.

param.span: 這會取代識別字串。

span.span: This replaces the identity string.

param.name: idProp
param.span: 指定要標註該項目的哪一個屬性。

span.span: Specifies which property of that element is to be annotated.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetPropServer (ref byte pIDString, uint dwIDStringLen, ref Guid paProps, int cProps, Accessibility.IAccPropServer pServer, Accessibility.AnnoScope AnnoScope);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetPropServer([in]unsigned int8& pIDString, [in]unsigned int32 dwIDStringLen, [in]valuetype System.Guid& paProps, [in]int32 cProps, [in]class Accessibility.IAccPropServer pServer, [in]valuetype Accessibility.AnnoScope AnnoScope) runtime managed

public: virtual void SetPropServer(System::Byte % pIDString, System::UInt32 dwIDStringLen, Guid % paProps, int cProps, Accessibility::IAccPropServer ^ pServer, Accessibility::AnnoScope AnnoScope) = Accessibility::IAccPropServices::SetPropServer;

param.name: pIDString
param.span: 識別要標註的可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the accessible element that is to be annotated.

param.name: dwIDStringLen
param.span: 指定由 pIDString 參數識別之字串的長度。

span.span: Specifies the length of the string identified by the pIDString parameter.

param.name: paProps
param.span: 指定屬性陣列，該陣列會由指定的回呼物件所處理。

span.span: Specifies an array of properties to be handled by the specified callback object.

param.name: cProps
param.span: 指定 paProps 陣列中的屬性數目。

span.span: Specifies the number of properties in the paProps array.

param.name: pServer
param.span: 指定用戶端要求其中一個被覆寫的屬性時叫用的回呼物件。

span.span: Specifies the callback object that will be invoked when a client requests one of the overridden properties.

param.name: AnnoScope
param.span: 可以是 ANNO_THIS，表示附註只會影響指定的可存取項目，或者為 ANNO_CONTAINER，表示附註會套用到項目與其直接子項目。

span.span: May be ANNO_THIS, indicating that the annotation affects the indicated accessible element only; or ANNO_CONTAINER, indicating that it applies to the element and its immediate element children.

summary.span: 和其所有公開的成員都是元件物件模型 (COM) 介面之 Managed 包裝函式的一部分。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetPropValue (ref byte pIDString, uint dwIDStringLen, Guid idProp, object var);

Public Overridable Sub SetPropValue (ByRef pIDString As Byte, dwIDStringLen As UInteger, idProp As Guid, var As Object)
public: virtual void SetPropValue(System::Byte % pIDString, System::UInt32 dwIDStringLen, Guid idProp, System::Object ^ var) = Accessibility::IAccPropServices::SetPropValue;

param.name: pIDString
param.span: 識別要標註的可存取項目。

span.span: Identifies the accessible element that is to be annotated.

param.name: dwIDStringLen
param.span: 指定由 pIDString 參數識別之字串的長度。

span.span: Specifies the length of the string identified by the pIDString parameter.

param.name: idProp
param.span: 指定要標註之可存取項目的屬性。

span.span: Specifies the property of the accessible element to be annotated.

param.name: var
param.span: 指定屬性的新值。

span.span: Specifies a new value for the property.
